name: Vegan Chickpea Croquettes recipe
description: Easy Crispy Vegan Croquettes made with canned chickpeas and leftover quinoa, with a satisfying nutty flavor and a gorgeous crunchy texture! Paired with tahini dill sauce, the perfect plant-based snack but they also make a great filling for wraps or vegan burritos.
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cup of cauliflower florets or use a mix of veggies with the cauliflower
1 tsp dried parsley  or 2 tbsp fresh
1/2 tsp dried dill or 1 tbsps fresh

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking sheet with parchment and preheat the oven to 425C (220C)
recipeInstructions.name: Line a baking sheet with parchment and preheat the oven to 425C (220C)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all of the ingredients under croquettes except bread crumbs to a food processor, pulse for 4-5 secs at a time until the mixture is evenly coarsely chopped
recipeInstructions.name: Add all of the ingredients under croquettes except bread crumbs to a food processor, pulse for 4-5 secs at a time until the mixture is evenly coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to a bowl, if the mixture is too wet, add 2-3 tbsp of bread crumbs and mix it
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer to a bowl, if the mixture is too wet, add 2-3 tbsp of bread crumbs and mix it

recipeInstructions.text: Shape the mix into whatever style of croquettes that you want
recipeInstructions.name: Shape the mix into whatever style of croquettes that you want

recipeInstructions.text: Roll each of them in bread crumb and place on a parchment lined baking sheet
recipeInstructions.name: Roll each of them in bread crumb and place on a parchment lined baking sheet

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 425F (220C) for 18-20 mins or until golden on the top
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 425F (220C) for 18-20 mins or until golden on the top

recipeInstructions.text: Serve these croquettes in wraps or bowl with the tahini dill sauce and ret of the garnishes
recipeInstructions.name: Serve these croquettes in wraps or bowl with the tahini dill sauce and ret of the garnishes

keywords: chickpea croquettes, easy croquettes, vegan croquettes recipe
